Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-47913 affecting package kubevirt for versions less than 1.5.0-6
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-47913 affecting package kubevirt for versions less than 1.5.0-6. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package kubevirt is earlier than 1.5.0-6, affected by CVE-2025-47913
